title: ISic000721. I.Sicily inscription 000721
body:
1OẠ
2DIC
3ỊTVM · Ḷ
4ORI · AV

1O.
2DIC
3.TVM·.
4ORI·AV

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Manganaro, controlled against photograph;
  • 1: Manganaro: [(nomen al dat.)]o .[el(?)--]
  • 2: Manganaro: [--- IIIIvir iur(e)] dic[(undo) --- praef]
  • 3: Manganaro: [coh. ---, trib. mil].tum .[eg(ionis) ---]
  • 4: Manganaro: [--- procurat]ori Au[g(usti)? ---]

translation

commentary

Manganaro published this fragment, observed in the Roman theatre, without realising that it is in fact part of ISic000780, a set of three joining fragments found in 1922 near the Odeon and published in 1923 by Libertini.

bibliography

    1989.0341q https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283 Manganaro 1989 177 no. 54 fig. 58 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001831
